DashboardLayoutSetAsTemplate.DESCRIPTION: Set the current dashboard layout as a template.

NAME.HELPER_TEXT: Enter a name for the template.
NAME.LABEL: Name

DashboardLayoutSetAsTemplate.TITLE: Custom Layout Template

DashboardLayoutUploadModal.DESCRIPTION: Select Dashboard Layout configuration file(s) to upload. File(s) must be in valid JSON format.

ERROR.DUPLICATE_UPLOAD: A previously uploaded file has the same name as the current file: "{{name}}".

NAME_INVALID.2: Dashboard name must be alphanumeric and may contain underscores, dashes, and periods.

ERROR.NAME_TAKEN: Dashboard layout with name "{{name}}" already exists.

HELP.CONTENT: Dashboard Layout configuration files are JSON files that contain a list of dashboard card configurations and a name for the dashboard layout. The dashboard layout name must be unique and may contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, dashes, and periods.

DashboardLayoutUploadModal.TITLE: Upload Dashboard Layout
